title: Electric potential - at point P from 4 spheres Q

content.question: Four small, identical charged spheres, each of charge <math alttext="positive Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>+</mo><mi>Q</mi></mpadded></math>, are located along a line near Point <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></math>, as shown in the figure. What is the electric potential at Point <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>P</mtext></math> due to the four spheres?

choices.label: <math alttext="positive 2 times the fraction k Q over D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mi>D</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="positive 4 times the fraction k Q over D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mi>D</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="positive five sixths times the fraction k Q over D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mi>D</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the positive fraction 17 over 6, end fraction, times the fraction k Q over D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>17</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mi>D</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the positive fraction 17 over 6, end fraction, times the fraction k Q over D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>17</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mi>D</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
